verses.name: Luke 7:31
verses.text: And the Lord said, Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation? and to what are they like?

verses.name: Luke 7:32
verses.text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace, and calling one to another, and saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned to you, and ye have not wept.

verses.name: Luke 7:33
verses.text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine; and ye say, He hath a devil.

verses.name: Luke 7:34
verses.text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking; and ye say, Behold a gluttonous man, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners!
